name: HiCAD Drawing File
summary: Learn about .SZA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: HiCAD is used for designing products in the plant engineering, metal or steel engineering, mechanical engineering, and sheet metal processing industries. The SZA file is the default format for storing products designed by HiCAD. The drawings are typically opened using HiCAD but they can also be opened using the free HiCAD Viewer program.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
